show.subtitle: “It’s Our Money with Ellen Brown” provides a unique view behind the curtain of global finance and the monetary system by one of the top experts in the field.
show.title: It´s Our Money with Ellen Brown

title: World Water Wars
content:
Dangerous stressors are converging around the growing demands for water the world over. <!--more--> Corporations and private capital are positioning themselves to take control as environmental changes turn humanity’s most essential element into just another commodity for profiteers.
Why aren’t affordable alternatives being pursued?
Might this even be intentional?
The usual culprits behind the monetary curtain are all here ready to let you drink, if you pay them.
Ellen speaks with Roger Landry on possible reasons.
